alert.note: Alert for Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:34PM EDT until July 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WINDSOR COUNTY... At 834 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Hartland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Weathersfield, West Windsor, Ascutney, Springfield, Hartland, Ascutney State Park, Amsden, Brownsville, and Wilgus State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
